name: Facility (Kirky₉₉₇ (Sam))
description:
You are an extremist environmental scientist. Horrified by the recent activities of the mega-corporation corporation known as the SYKES corporation have constructed another one of their ‘harvester facilities’. Your job is to stop the power supply, shut down the facility and send a strong message that their ways of environmental destruction is not welcome here.
